Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Establishes the COVID-19 recovery commission
Summary: Establishes the COVID-19 recovery commission to determine how much funding to seek and new issuances that will be sold to the Federal Reserve Municipal Liquidity Facility and to gather information, testimony, advice and other input to make allocation decisions in respect of the new funding and recovery efforts related to novel coronavirus, COVID-19; requires the commission to report its findings to the governor and legislature monthly.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to establishing the COVID-19 Recovery Commission
